## Using this plugin

- Excalidraw is a whiteboard tool that lets you sketch diagrams and drawings.
- This plugin adds a button to the toolbar that opens a local version of the Excalidraw editor specific to your slides.
- Click the ðŸŽ¨ (Artist Palette Emoji) button button to open the Excalidraw editor.

## Keyboard shortcut

- Alternatively, you can click the `\`` (backtick) button on your keyboard to toggle the Excalidraw editor.
- See the [README.md](README.md) file to learn more.
